titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Russian Leaves Collection, 1775, 1790

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Emma Gronbeck January 2024.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: Leaves from two 18th century Russian manuscripts, one of Bible stories and one of holiday hymns.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Leaves from two 18th century Russian manuscripts, one of Bible stories and one of holiday hymns.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: Bible
Illumination of books and manuscripts, Russian
Manuscripts, Russian
Music--Manuscripts

controlaccess.head: VCL Categories:
controlaccess.subject: Middle Eastern, Asian, Ethiopian, and Russian Manuscripts

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Materials separated from the Medieval and Renaissance Manuscripts Collection and processed separately, January 2024.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gifts and transfers from a variety of sources.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Russian Leaves Collection, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.
